Translations.Text: vinaash ho us vyakti ka, jo kachoke lagaata rahata hai aur chaute karata rahata hai
jisane dhan ekatr kiya aur use gin-gin kar rakha
kya vah samajhata hai ki usaka dhan use sansaar mein sada rakhega
kadaapi aisa nahin hoga. vah avashy hee hautama mein phenka jaayega
aur tum kya jaano ki hautama kya hai
vah allaah kee bhadakaee huee agni hai
vah, usamen band kar diye jaayenge
